```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
EU_GHG <- list()
EU_GHG$data <- read_csv("C:/Users/User/Desktop/R/R_Visualization/Tasks/EU GHG/EU GHG emissions.csv")
names(EU_GHG$data) <- c("Unit (kt or %)", "year", "Sectors", "Emissions", "Gas", "Name" )
names(EU_GHG$data)
EU_GHG$transport |> View()

EU_GHG$transport <- {
  filter(EU_GHG$data, Sectors=="Domestic transport")
}
```

這邊嘗試使用geom+line不成功，思考後發現應該是因為
這邊的資料並不是連續資料~
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(
  data=EU_GHG$transport
)+
  geom_point(
      mapping = aes(
    x=year,
    y=Emissions/1000,
  ),
  color="black",
  size=1
  )
```
